page.title: 15Reading Habits in Fremington
page.content: Here are the results of a small survey we did on the children at our school to find out about what they thought of books and reading in general. Most of the children like reading. They usually read for between 2 and 5 hours a week. Most liked fiction books. Some peopie have comics and magasines regularly. Most peopie read two books a week. Most peopie read more at home than at school. Some people prefered hard backs to paperbacks but most didnt mind. A lot of children read in the evenings. Lots of peopie bought the books that they read but some borrowed all their books from the libary. Nobody read The Bible!
